markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 9"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Anarchic Arcana](/Feats.aspx?ID=2539) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Ganzi" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=339" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 97 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

The magic in your blood is unpredictable. When you make your daily preparations, roll 1d12 twice and consult the following list. 1: [_acid arrow_](/Spells.aspx?ID=2); 2: [_blur_](/Spells.aspx?ID=28); 3: [_hideous laughter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=150); 4: [_humanoid form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=153); 5: [_illusory object_](/Spells.aspx?ID=160); 6: [_mirror image_](/Spells.aspx?ID=197); 7: [_resist energy_](/Spells.aspx?ID=256); 8: [_see invisibility_](/Spells.aspx?ID=271); 9: [_shatter_](/Spells.aspx?ID=279); 10: [_sound burst_](/Spells.aspx?ID=292); 11: [_spider climb_](/Spells.aspx?ID=299); 12: [_telekinetic maneuver_](/Spells.aspx?ID=333). You can cast each of those two spells once during the following day (or one spell twice if you rolled doubles) as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Anarchic Arcana

summary_markdown: The magic in your blood is unpredictable.
text: <title level="1" right="Feat 9" pfs="Standard" > Anarchic Arcana Source Ancestry Guide pg. 97 2.0 --- The magic in your blood is unpredictable. When you make your daily preparations, roll 1d12 twice and consult the following list. 1: acid arrow ; 2: blur ; 3: hideous laughter ; 4: humanoid form ; 5: illusory object ; 6: mirror image ; 7: resist energy ; 8: see invisibility ; 9: shatter ; 10: sound burst ; 11: spider climb ; 12: telekinetic maneuver . You can cast each of those two spells once during the following day (or one spell twice if you rolled doubles) as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
